name: Maze Of Bullets
description:
PLEASE READ BEFORE PLAYING! 

IF PLAYING IN BROWSER PLEASE USE FULLSCREEN

You are a little square confined into a maze. This maze is filled with bullets and your goal is to escape!

HOW TO PLAY:

ARROWS: Move the square

Space: Dash

Left Shift: Move Slower

Note: There's a secret level, let me know in the comments if you found it ;)

Credits:

Music: Patrikus Droilius
